# FtoC

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of FtoC is to allow you to use the function F_to_C, which converts Fahrenheit temperature measurements to Celcius.

## Installation

You can install the development version of FtoC like this:

Package installation can be done by calling `devtools::install_github("stat545ubc-2025/F_to_C")`

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(FtoC)
F_to_C(c(28, 54, 90))
```
